title: Chat restrictions staying at 10 game and not dropping off
body: I received a 10 game chat restriction. I have played multiple games now, and the restrictions are not dropping off and it keeps notifying me every single game.

replies.body: Hmmmmm I checked your account and I don't see that you currently have any more games to play with a chat restriction. If you're still seeing that notification at this point, hit me back up and let me know so I can figure out what's going on!
